description:
With Takeda and Uesugi injured, the remaining alliance leaders plot their final assault against Oda. Even though the situation looks bleak, Date and Sanada prepare to face their destinies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yukimura Beyond Recovery?! The Date Army`s Tearful Disbandment!
Yukimura Saikifunou!? Date Ikusa Namida no Kaisan!!
幸村再起不能!? 伊達軍涙の解散!!
